item.title: Why I'm Starting This Blog
item.author: visaal.sivakumar@gmail.com (Visaal Ambalam)
item.description: In a nutshell, I want to! That’s it. That’s the blog post. (jk)

item.title: About
item.author: visaal.sivakumar@gmail.com (Visaal Ambalam)
item.description: Hi, I’m Visaal Ambalam. I am a software engineer Liveramp, currently enjoying the process of learning how to build distributed systems. I am an aspiring content creator, hence this blog! I tend to be ruthlessly practical (for better or worse). I am fascinated by the implications of the internet on society. In the past, I thought I wanted to be a doctor. I realized I like building things. I built web apps at Cerner and ObodoHub.
